parameters.query:
INSERT INTO life.home_events (entity_id, action, old_state, new_state, source, metadata)
VALUES (
  '{{ $('Prepare Service Call').item.json.entityId }}',
  '{{ $('Prepare Service Call').item.json.originalAction }}',
  NULL,
  'executed',
  'ios',
  '{}'::jsonb
)
RETURNING id;
